item.title: Thai Polyester CO., LTD
item.description: Thai Polyester Company. We are full integration of fiber polyester manufacturer with total capacity 316,800 tons a years achieved thereby of the innovative technology in globe.

item.title: About us | Thai Polyester CO., LTD
item.description: Thai polyester is a registered company specializing in polyester yarn both fiber and filament. We offer a wide range of recycled product, virgin and also dope dye in order to respond to customer in different industry

item.title: All Polyester Products | Thai Polyester CO., LTD
item.description: All Polyester Products | Thai Polyester CO., LTD

item.title: PSF (Polyester Staple Fiber) | Thai Polyester CO., LTD
item.description: Polyester staple fiber is a material produced from synthetic chemical compounds with a variety of uses in the textile, automotive and furniture industries

item.title: DTY (Draw Textured Yarn) | Thai Polyester CO., LTD
item.description: Draw Textured Yarn is a multifilament yarn with soft crimp, high bulk and texture creating natural feel, high durability and. retention properties

item.title: FDY(Fully Drawn Yarn) | Thai Polyester CO., LTD
item.description: Fully Drawn Yarn is produced by a process similiar to POY manufacturing .the yarn is produced at higher spinning speeds coupled with intermediate drawing integrated in the process itself

item.title: Monofilament | Thai Polyester CO., LTD
item.description: Monofilament is also known as single polyester yarns, mother yarn for splitting. Mono filament yarn has soft touch and good physical properties

item.title: Open End | Thai Polyester CO., LTD
item.description: the fiber sliver is separated into single fibers and in which the separated fiber material is brought by an air stream to a collecting surface from which it is drawn off while being twisted

item.title: Ring Spun | Thai Polyester CO., LTD
item.description: Ring spun yarn is made by twisting and thinning the polyester strands to make a very fine, strong, soft rope of polyester fibers

item.title: Twist Yarn | Thai Polyester CO., LTD
item.description: - Twist is the spiral arrangement of the fibres around the axis of the yarn. The twist binds the fibres together and also contributes to the strength of the yarn.

item.title: Dope dyed | Thai Polyester CO., LTD
item.description: Dope dyed yarns are created by adding a masterbatch colorant to the polymer melt in spinning or extrusion This results in fibers and filaments that are fully impregnated with pigment coming out of the spinnerets in a one step process.

item.title: 100% Recycled Polyester | Thai Polyester CO., LTD
item.description: Nowadays, we are surrounded by millions of plastic waste. one of the things that all of us can do to protect the environment is "recycling" EcoTPC is the Thai sustainable brand that We concern about plastic pollution. Our Recycled products come from 2 sources which are PET post consumer bottle and fabric waste and yarn. All of our recycled product are 100% Recycled polyester with GRS certificate.

item.title: recycling | Thai Polyester CO., LTD
item.description: we assure that our organization commits with environmental friendly sustainable operation and products. Our current priority is to take responsibility to sustain our planet focusing on recycling, reusing and reducing. We have used 100% recycled polyester

item.title: Contact us | Thai Polyester CO., LTD
item.description: if you are interested in polyester and recycled polyester product or you have any question do not hesitate to contact us. we have a special offer for you!

item.title: 100% Recycled (Polyester Staple Fiber) | Thai Polyester CO., LTD
item.description: Polyester staple fiber that made from 100 % recycled polyester sources which are PET post consumer bottle and fabric and yarn waste

item.title: 100% Recycled (Open End) | Thai Polyester CO., LTD
item.description: Open-end that made from 100 % recycled polyester sources which are PET post consumer bottle and fabric and yarn waste

item.title: 100% Recycled (Fully Drawn Yarn) | Thai Polyester CO., LTD
item.description: Fully Drawn Yarn that made from 100 % recycled polyester sources which are PET post consumer bottle and fabric and yarn waste

item.title: 100% Recycled (Draw Textured Yarn) | Thai Polyester CO., LTD
item.description: Draw Textured Yarn that made from 100 % recycled polyester sources which are PET post consumer bottle and fabric and yarn waste

item.title: 100% Recycled (Ring Spun) | Thai Polyester CO., LTD
item.description: Ring spun yarn that made from 100 % recycled polyester sources which are PET post consumer bottle and fabric and yarn waste
